attributes.action: I want to start a petition to stop the increase in energy prices
attributes.additional_details: The government are public servants and are supposedly in position to serve the best interests of their constituents, people are starving, getting into huge debts due to the economic mess this country is in so stopping the increase and pushing for reductions is in the whole countries interest
attributes.background: I want the government to stop energy companies increasing energy prices they are making vast profits so there is clearly no need for this

rejection.details:
The Government is not directly responsible for the price of energy, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Reinstate the two year energy price guarantee: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625700

Subsidise energy and fuel prices to mitigate cost increases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622530

Remove the link between electricity prices and the price of gas: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621874
